holes.original_proof:
push_neg at h₄
exact h₄ ⟨p, hp⟩

simp [hP, h₃, Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq, sq_nonneg, add_nonneg, mul_self_nonneg] at h₃ ⊢
ring_nf at h₃ ⊢
nlinarith

simp [Xor', Prod.ext_iff] at h₆ h₁₀ ⊢
simp_all [hP, Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq, sq_nonneg, add_nonneg, mul_self_nonneg]

simp [hP, h₃, Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq, sq_nonneg, add_nonneg, mul_self_nonneg] at h₃ ⊢
ring_nf at h₃ ⊢
nlinarith

simp [Xor', Prod.ext_iff] at h₆ h₁₃ ⊢
simp_all [hP, Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq, sq_nonneg, add_nonneg, mul_self_nonneg]
ring_nf at *
norm_num at *
aesop

constructor
intro h
exact h_main h
intro h
exfalso
exact h
